guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

author.bio: “There's no discernible fundamental difference between those who engage in 'casual sex' with the opposite sex, those who prey upon children, those who masturbate, or those who fornicate with the same sex, inanimate objects, the dead, or beasts."

body: Because their pastors, assuming they were taught the truth at all, refused to share with them the truth of the word of Jesus Christ.

author.bio:

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
Probably because Christian churches have mostly become political echochambers and not much else. They're often run to exploit people. And anything not falling *exactly* in line with the cabal of mainstream megachurch pastors and televangelists is immediately dismissed as heresy or "liberal" theology.

There is also the fact that there is a legitimate disconnect with Judaism because Christianity has been in the hands of anti-semites for thousands of years. Sometimes this makes it contradict the old testament, for example they just *had* to make up a story about Jesus being born from a virgin, possibly to deny his Jewish blood (or maybe Jews did it to deny his Samaritan/Moabite ancestry), which contradicts the old testament prophecy about a messiah from the Davidic line. This can make it look like Jesus is a fake. The old testament is also tampered with, sometimes removing prophecies about Jesus or editing something to make it say what the elites and scribes wanted it to, which often does contradict Jesus's message.
body_html:
Probably because Christian churches have mostly become political echochambers and not much else. They're often run to exploit people. And anything not falling exactly in line with the cabal of mainstream megachurch pastors and televangelists is immediately dismissed as heresy or "liberal" theology.

There is also the fact that there is a legitimate disconnect with Judaism because Christianity has been in the hands of anti-semites for thousands of years. Sometimes this makes it contradict the old testament, for example they just had to make up a story about Jesus being born from a virgin, possibly to deny his Jewish blood (or maybe Jews did it to deny his Samaritan/Moabite ancestry), which contradicts the old testament prophecy about a messiah from the Davidic line. This can make it look like Jesus is a fake. The old testament is also tampered with, sometimes removing prophecies about Jesus or editing something to make it say what the elites and scribes wanted it to, which often does contradict Jesus's message.
